metadata.synopsis: Two civilians are discussing the bruises one of them got from what he believe is a guilder. It was actually one of the Stone Men. This is the female human one-liner.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Go to -1; 50; -29.- Talk to the female human of the Bruised Local vignette.

0.speaker: Brigid
0.text: Don't wander around Rivington alone, all right? My husband did and got mugged and beaten for his trouble.

1.speaker: Brigid
1.text: Keep your gold close, and your wits about you.
